landingPage.main_title: A New Cool Way to Learn
landingPage.main_desc: Elios is the best platform to help you enhance your skills, expand your knowledge and prepare for technical interviews.
landingPage.explore_desc: Explore is a well-organized tool that helps you get the most out of Elios by providing structure to guide your progress towards the next step in your programming career.

explore.forum_desc: Where developers connect, share experience, ask questions, and learn daily from a thriving community.
explore.challenge_desc: Hundreds of real-world problems — from beginner to advanced — to sharpen your algorithmic thinking and ace any interview.
explore.cv_desc: Create a professional, ATS-friendly CV in minutes with stunning templates that highlight your coding skills.

landingPage.creator: Creators of Elios
